member.name: T:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu
member.summary: Represents a most recently used (MRU) menu.
member.remarks:
This class shows the MRU list in a popup menu. To display the MRU list "inline" use .
The class will optionally load the last set of files from the registry on construction and store them when instructed by the main program.
Internally, this class uses zero-based numbering for the items. The displayed numbers, however, will start with one.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem,PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ClickedHandler)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenu class.
member.param: The temporary menu item which will be replaced with the MRU list.
The delegate to handle the item selection (click) event.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem,PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ClickedHandler,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenu class.
member.param: The temporary menu item which will be replaced with the MRU list.
The delegate to handle the item selection (click) event.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem,PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ClickedHandler,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenu class.
member.param: The temporary menu item which will be replaced with the MRU list.
The delegate to handle the item selection (click) event.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem,PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ClickedHandler,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenu class.
member.param: The temporary menu item which will be replaced with the MRU list.
The delegate to handle the item selection (click) event.
The name or path of the registry key to use to store the MRU list and settings.
The maximum number of items on the MRU list.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem,PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ClickedHandler,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenu class.
member.param: The temporary menu item which will be replaced with the MRU list.
The delegate to handle the item selection (click) event.
The name or path of the registry key to use to store the MRU list and settings.
Loads the MRU settings from the registry immediately.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem,PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ClickedHandler,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenu class.
member.param: The temporary menu item which will be replaced with the MRU list.
The delegate to handle the item selection (click) event.
The name or path of the registry key to use to store the MRU list and settings.
Loads the MRU settings from the registry immediately.
The maximum number of items on the MRU list.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.ShortenPathname(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shortens a pathname for display purposes.
member.param: The pathname to shorten.
The maximum number of characters to be displayed.
member.remarks:
Shortens a pathname by either removing consecutive components of a path and/or by removing characters from the end of the filename and replacing then with three elipses (...)
In all cases, the root of the passed path will be preserved in it's entirety.
If a UNC path is used or the pathname and maxLength are particularly short, the resulting path may be longer than maxLength.
This method expects fully resolved pathnames to be passed to it. (Use Path.GetFullPath() to obtain this.)

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.FindFilenameNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the entry number matching the passed filename.
member.param: The filename to search for.
member.returns: The entry number of the matching filename or -1 if not found.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.FindFilenameMenuIndex(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the menu index of the passed filename.
member.param: The filename to search for.
member.returns: The menu index of the matching filename or -1 if not found.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.GetMenuIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the menu index for a specified MRU item number.
member.param: The MRU item number.
member.returns: The menu index of the passed MRU number.

member.name: T:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.MruMenuItem
member.summary: The menu item which will contain the MRU entry.
member.remarks: The menu may display a shortened or otherwise invalid pathname. This class stores the actual filename, preferably as a fully resolved labelName, that will be returned in the event handler.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.MruMenuItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MruMenuItem class.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.MruMenuItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.EventHandler)
member.summary: Initializes an MruMenuItem object.
member.param: The string to actually return in the eventHandler.
The string that will be displayed in the menu.
The EventHandler that handles the Click event for this menu item.

member.name: P:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenu.MruMenuItem.Filename
member.summary: Gets the filename.

member.name: T:PFConnectionStrings.MruStripMenuInline
member.summary: Represents an inline most recently used (mru) menu.
member.remarks: This class shows the MRU list "inline". To display the MRU list as a popup menu use MruMenu.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.ConnectionStringPrompt.BuildConnectionDefinition(System.String,System.String,PFConnectionObjects.enConnectionAccessStatus)
member.summary: Routine to create a connection definition object.
member.param: Name for the connection definition.
Connection string associated with the connection name.
Last connection access status: e.g. open, closed, unknown.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.ConnectionStringPrompt.GetConnectionDefinition
member.summary: Retrieves all connection definitions defined and saved by current user.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.ConnectionStringPrompt.GetConnectionDefinition(PFDataAccessObjects.DatabasePlatform)
member.summary: Retrieves connection definitions defined and saved by current user for the specified database platform.
member.param: DatabasePlatform used in the connection strings to be retrieved.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.ConnectionStringPrompt.SaveConnectionDefinition(PFConnectionObjects.PFConnectionDefinition)
member.summary: Saves connection definition to external storage.
member.param: Connection definition object to be saved.
member.returns: Path to saved XML file containing connection definition.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.ConnectionStringPrompt.RenameConnectionDefinition(PFDataAccessObjects.DatabasePlatform)
member.summary: Allows renaming of connection definitions from list of saved definitions.
member.param: Database platform for which the connections are defined.

member.name: M:PFConnectionStrings.ConnectionStringPrompt.DeleteConnectionDefinition(PFDataAccessObjects.DatabasePlatform)
member.summary: Allows deleting of connection definitions from list of saved definitions.
member.param: Database platform for which the connections are defined.

member.summary: DbPlatform Property contains one of the values in the DatabasePlatform enumeration.
